name: CuckMagic
author: andrew3k
notes: I went with double econ over SRH for the take and tribute plays. The deck only consistently struggled with gladiators because if you don't get a second dark magic attack with the skill you cant really deal with back row. Floodgate is the real MVP since it stops bamboo otk decks if you go first and stops your opponents  momentum while you set up your DM combos
